name: DELAYED (PntherArt)
description:
Hijack that plane!

Entirely inspired by a reccent time when I was stuck in Sydney Airport for 6 hours because my flight home kept getting delayed. While I was in the company of friends... I definitely would've loved for someone to hijack a plane to get us home faster.

Controls vary from mini game. 

Credits & Atrributes in Read Me File :)! 

This was a submission to RMIT Game A Week 2022 - 10 seconds. Check out my peers games they are very cool and talented <3
